message:
看这里：口亨！
以下是大学申请的结果w

Carnegie Mellon University / Denied

University of California
·UCLA / Denied
·UC Berkeley / Denied
·UC Davis / Accepted

University of Washington, Seattle / Accepted
University of Illinois, Chicago / Accepted
Georgia Tech / Denied
New York University / Denied
Polytechnic Institute of New York University / Accepted, Promise Scholarship

McGill University / Accepted

综上所述只有NYU Poly给钱了，所以九成会去NYU Poly
大家做好被毁三观瞎狗眼的准备了嘛？
title: 说好的真相
